org.bukkit.attributes

Interface AttributeValue


  • public interface AttributeValue
    The state of a particular Attribute for a particular LivingEntity, consisting of a base value and a set of AttributeModifiers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Add the given modifier to the set modifying this attribute.
      Attribute getAttribute()
      The Attribute this value is for
      double getBase()
      The value without any AttributeModifiers applied.
      double getFinal()
      The effective value of the attribute, with AttributeModifiers applied.
      AttributeModifier getModifier(UUID id)
      Get the AttributeModifier with the given UUID, or null if no such modifier has been applied to this attribute.
      boolean hasModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Has the given modifier been applied to this attribute?
      boolean hasModifier(UUID id)
      Has an AttributeModifier with the given UUID been applied to this attribute?
      void removeModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Remove the given modifier from the set modifying this attribute.
      void removeModifier(UUID id)
      Remove the AttributeModifier with the given ID from the set modifying this attribute.
      void setBase(double value)
      Set the base value
